titleStmt.title: The Roman history from the building of the city to the perfect settlement of the empire by Augustus Caesar containing the space of 727 years : design'd as well for the understanding of the Roman authors as the Roman affairs / by Laurence Echard ...
titleStmt.author: Echard, Laurence, 1670?-1730.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition, carefully revis'd and much improv'd.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Hodgkin for M. Gillyflower ... and R. Parker ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
